CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 流动；流；流畅；流淌；充满；涨潮；水位上升；顺畅进行；连续不断；飘动；飘垂；泛滥；溢出
流；流动；连贯；涨潮；滔滔不绝；持续生产；不断供应

synonym.mean: 流动，涌流；川流不息；飘扬

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指水或其它液体从源头流出，不断地朝某一方向流动，可用作引申。
通常指从高向低或从上向下的急剧流动。也可作引申用。
侧重水继续不断地往前流，不关心其流量的大小和速度的快慢。
指液体向任何方向流动，暗示比flow快而有力。

word_group.brief_definition: 顺应潮流, 随波逐流
流程图；作业图；生产过程图解
流畅；连贯；滔滔不绝；卖力；起劲
车流；交通流量；交通情况

bilingual.source: The water pleaded, "Please pull some weeds so I can flow freely."
bilingual.target: 水恳求道：“请拔掉一些杂草，这样我才能自由流动。”

bilingual.source: The river will flow into the sea.
The dam stopped the flow of the river.
bilingual.target: 水坝阻止了河水的流动。

bilingual.source: Let the water flow freely from the tap.
bilingual.target: 让水从水龙头中自由流动。
嚼口香糖可以刺激唾液流动。

bilingual.source: The flow of electrons creates an electric current.
The viscosity of honey makes it flow slowly.
bilingual.target: 蜂蜜的粘度使它流动缓慢。

bilingual.source: Electric resistance affects the flow of current.
bilingual.target: 电阻会影响电流的流动。

bilingual.source: The water pump is broken, and the water cannot flow.
The fluid flow in this region is irrotational.
bilingual.target: 该区域的流体流动是无旋的。

list.abstract: flow（英 [fləʊ]，美 [floʊ]），英语单词。作动词为流动；涨潮；来自等。作名词为流淌；湿地；沼泽等。例句：Smooth traffic flow on the road.（路上交通顺畅。） flow的近义词有stream，dance，drown out等。

flow，日本超人气摇滚乐队，演唱火影忍者主题曲的最强组合。由KOHSHI (Vo.&Gt.)、KEIGO (Vo.)、TAKE(Gt.)、GOT‘S(B.)、IWASAKI(Dr.)组成的日本双主唱形式的男性5人摇滚乐队。 2003年1月发行的单曲《赠る言叶》销量突破27万枚。担当过许多超人气动漫主题曲，如《火影忍者》《交响诗篇》《叛逆的鲁鲁修》《恶魔奶爸》、《龙珠z》剧场版《龙珠z 神与神》等。已担当《火影忍者》主题曲4次，是提供该动漫主题曲最多的歌手。比起动漫主题曲，演唱的电视剧主题曲更多。2010年6月发行的专辑『MICROCOSM』在欧美等44个国家发行，进军海外乐坛，并在法国举办的Japan Expo获得最优秀J-MUSIC专辑奖。2014年的宣言是「平成26年是FLOW的年」!

yingyinNormal.en: She's always going on about the flow of energy, the spirits of animals.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她总是执着于能量流动，还有动物的灵魂。

yingyinNormal.en: And they like to let money flow in and out of their country without causing too much disruption.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第三点，他们都喜欢让资金的流动不要有太多阻碍。

yingyinNormal.en: You can either fix your exchange rate and let money flow freely across national borders, but have no control over your interest rates, or control your interest and exchange rates, but then you can't stop the capital flowing in and out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你只能选择试着稳定你的兑币汇率后让资金在各国自由流通，但无法控制利率变动，或者是选择控制你的利率及兑币汇率，而让资金的流动变得不受控制。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. How does the flow rate in a pipe depend on its diameter?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，管直径如何决定流量。

yingyinNormal.en: And from whose authority does that flow? The child, the old woman, or the pretender?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁委托给你这个权利的？小屁孩，老女人，还是冒牌货？

yingyinNormal.en: Before that, sewage and waste would just flow right down the street. Yeah, sometimes ankle deep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之前污水跟废弃物会直接流到街上，有时到了脚踝。

yingyinNormal.en: Enjoy the warm, blue water and the ocean breezes, see the red-hot lava flow and delve into a lush green jungle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这里既可享受温暖、蓝色的海水及海风，观看炽热的熔岩流，并可深入繁茂的绿色丛林中。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a terrific book. I've distilled its essence into a simple flow chart that will guide me through the process.
yingyinNormal.zh: 超赞的书，我摘录它的精华制作了流程图来指导我。

yingyinNormal.en: The great circulation of marine currents that flow around the globe and regulate the climate is gradually blocking up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 环绕全球，调节气候的洋流循环正逐渐减弱。

yingyinNormal.en: Body Rocket with Papo, Flex Flow with Nat, and Ab Attack with Abby, and I just signed up for Celtic Hip-Hop with Devandre O'Brien.
yingyinNormal.zh: 帕伯的健美身材课，奈特的弹性韵律课，与艾比的腹肌训练课，我还报名了奥布莱恩的凯尔特嘻哈舞蹈课。

yingyinNormal.en: The streets flow with blood and echo with the cries of the wounded. Oh, excellent choice. Now, put on your hardhat and safety vest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 街道上血流成河，遍地伤者哀嚎不已。选得好啊，快戴上安全帽，穿上安全背心。

yingyinNormal.en: There are three primary theories concerning sediment flow rate. Each of these theories can be further sub-categorized into two distinct...
yingyinNormal.zh: 沉积速率有三个主要理论，每一个还可以细分为两个…

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. Okay. Okay. There are three primary theories concerning sediment flow rate. Each of these theories can be further sub-categorized into…
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，沉积速率有三个主要理论，每一个还可以细分为两个…

yingyinNormal.en: I just leave the income section blank if I want. Corporate doesn't care. These people just want homes. You know, and they go with the flow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我把收入那一栏空着就好了，公司不介意这个的，这些人就想有个住的地方，就顺其自然了。

yingyinNormal.en: Conversely, some studies have shown that hand dryers may actually emit bacteria in their flow, because of the contaminated air from the bathroom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 相反的，有些研究显示，因为厕所受污染的空气，烘手机吹出来的风其实是有细菌的。

yingyinNormal.en: Salute the Island of Hawaii with a Mai Tai or Lava Flow-inspired cocktail: Here's to earth, water, wind, and fire, nature's splendid gifts to human kind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 以果汁甜酒或以熔岩为灵感调制的鸡尾酒，向夏威夷岛致敬：敬这里的土壤、海水、微风和火焰，大自然送给人类最精彩的礼物。

yingyinNormal.en: At the United Nations in New York, I worked to build more support for this coalition to cut off terrorist financing and to stop the flow of foreign fighters into and out of that region.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在纽约的联合国总部，我努力让这一联盟获得更多的支持，切断恐怖分子的资金来源，终止外国分子进出这一区域。

yingyinNormal.en: A pulmonary angiogram provides a clear picture of the blood flow in the arteries and the lungs, which is what we look for in a pulmonary embolism, a condition in which Mr. Weatherly's symptoms are common.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肺血管造影可清晰看到动脉和肺部的血流，这样就能检查是否有肺栓塞，肺栓塞通常会引起威瑟利先生表现出的症状。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, the wheat is going to flow down this spout here, if I just pull this little flap out at the top, the mill stones are inside this big wooden box and the grain will get crushed in-between the two stones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 粮食就能顺着一涌而下，如果我把上面的开关打开，粮食就会进到木头盒子里，里面是两块磨石，用来碾碎粮食。

yingyinNormal.en: And the decisions we make now will determine whether or not we accelerate this progress, whether economic gains flow to a few at the top or whether a growing economy fuels rising incomes and a thriving middle class.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们现在所做出的决策将决定我们能否为这一进展提供动力：要么使经济发展成果流向社会顶层的少数人，要么使经济发展为提高社会工资待遇和建设欣欣向荣的中产阶级提供动力。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 溢出；满得溢出；容纳不下；挤满人了；淹没；充满；洋溢

word_family.mean: v. 流；流动；流出；来自；富有；顺利进行；涨潮；水位上升；飘拂

sense_info_list.en: (especially of a liquid)move along or out steadily and continuously in a current or stream

examination_example.sentence: But a boost in the storage capacity of batteries is making their ability to keep power <highlight>flowing</highlight> around the clock more likely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，电池存储容量的提高使其更有可能保持电力全天候流动。

examination_example.sentence: You'd think this might fuel the efficiency mind-set, but in fact, Eberle notes, such ritualistic behaviour helps us "step outside time's <highlight>flow</highlight>" into "soul time."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能会认为这可能会助长效率思维模式，但事实上，埃伯利指出，这种仪式化的行为有助于我们“走出时间的流动”，进入“灵魂时间”。

examination_example.sentence: If we adults could indulge in a bit of silliness and giggling, we would improve blood <highlight>flow</highlight> to our hearts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们成年人可以纵情于少许的愚蠢和傻笑，我们将改善流向心脏的血液。

examination_example.sentence: I truly believe that once you get that first word out everything else will just <highlight>flow</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我真的相信，一旦你说出第一个字，其他的一切都会水到渠成。

examination_example.sentence: When we travel down a well-known route, because we don't have to concentrate much, time seems to <highlight>flow</highlight> more quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当走在一条熟悉的路线上时，因为我们不需要关注太多，时间似乎就过得更快。

sense_info_list.en: a steady, continuous stream of something

examination_example.sentence: Television is a one-way tap <highlight>flowing</highlight> into our homes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电视是一个单向的水龙头，涌入我们的家庭。

word_usage.usage: flow常用于抽象的表达，如go with the flow 随大流。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 溢出；满得溢出；容纳不下；挤满人了；淹没；充满；洋溢

word_family.mean: v. 流；流动；流出；来自；富有；顺利进行；涨潮；水位上升；飘拂

sense_info_list.en: move in one direction, especially continuously and easily
hang down loosely and often attractively
proceed or be produced smoothly, continuously, and effortlessly

exam_freq_info.chinese: 持续; 持续供应/到来

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 溢出；满得溢出；容纳不下；挤满人了；淹没；充满；洋溢

word_family.mean: v. 流；流动；流出；来自；富有；顺利进行；涨潮；水位上升；飘拂

sense_info_list.en: move in one direction; especially continuously and easily

examination_example.sentence: Changes in brain cells can affect communication between different regions of the brain. And blood <highlight>flow</highlight> can be reduced as blood vessels narrow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 脑细胞的变化会影响大脑不同区域之间的交流。随着血管变窄，血流可以减少。

examination_example.sentence: Physical activity can improve blood <highlight>flow</highlight> to the brain, fueling memory, attention and creativity, which are essential to learning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 体育活动可以促进血液流向大脑，增强记忆，注意力和创造力——这些都是学习的必要条件。

sense_info_list.en: continue to arrive or be produced
sense_info_list.zh: 持续; 持续供应/到来

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: move in one direction, especially continuously and easily

examination_example.sentence: We're now building a clock at the Anchorage Museum that reflects the total <highlight>flow</highlight> of several major Alaskan rivers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们现在正在安克雷奇博物馆建造一个时钟，它反映了阿拉斯加几条主要河流的总流量。

examination_example.sentence: We've programmed it to match an atomic clock if the waterways continue to <highlight>flow</highlight> at their present rate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们已经对它进行了编程，以便在水道继续以当前速率流动时与原子钟相匹配。

examination_example.sentence: The downside is that in those dead periods I often would let my thoughts <highlight>flow</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不好的一面是，在那段死气沉沉的时间里，我本可以常常让我的思绪流动起来。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 溢出；满得溢出；容纳不下；挤满人了；淹没；充满；洋溢

word_family.mean: v. 流；流动；流出；来自；富有；顺利进行；涨潮；水位上升；飘拂

sense_info_list.en: move in one direction, especially continuously and easily

examination_example.sentence: Every time we wash our jeans, tiny bits of denim will <highlight>flow</highlight> out of our washing machines, down into the world's rivers, lakes and oceans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次我们洗牛仔裤时，微小的牛仔布碎片就会从洗衣机里流出，流入世界各地的河流、湖泊和海洋。

examination_example.sentence: Four of the top 10 longest rivers <highlight>flow</highlight> through China at some point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 前10条最长的河流中有4条在某个时候流经中国。

examination_example.sentence: Blood vessels in the head tighten to stop the loss of body heat and then relax to let blood <highlight>flow</highlight> rise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 头部的血管收紧以阻止体温流失，然后放松让血液流动。
